metadata.title: In situ HCR validation of lineage markers

params.note: In situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) staining was performed to validate lineage markers, confirming increased SFRP2+ retinal progenitors at lower retinoic acid (RA) concentrations and increased FOXA2+ ventralized/posterior fates at higher RA concentrations (Fig. 2d, Extended Data Fig. 3l,m).
